dct_title_s: Oil and gas infrastructure in the Caspian Sea region : March 2012
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading. Depths shown by gradient tints. Oilfields, gasfields, pipelines, refineries, concession areas, and tanker terminals are located. Includes chart, "Selected consortiums in the Caspian Region," with graphs illustrating ownership of major fossil-fuel companies. Ancillary map: Former Soviet Central Asian republics showing current and proposed pipeline capacity. Map no:  "803519AI (G02442) 3-12."
dct_subject_sm: Oil and gas leases—Caspian Sea Region—Maps
Oil and gas leases—Black Sea Region—Maps
